name.jp: ギルドメンバー増幅の巻物
name.vi: Danh sách các thành viên của Guild.

description.en: Permanently increases the amount of members you can have in a guild by 5. Only works on the current guild you are in.
description.ar: Permanently increases the amount of members you can have in a guild by 5. Only works on the current guild you are in.
description.br: Aumenta permanentemente em 5 a quantidade de membros que você pode ter em uma guilda. Só funciona na sua guilda atual.
description.cns: 永久增加你所在的公会可以拥有的成员数量 5个。仅适用于你当前所在的公会。
description.de: Erhöht dauerhaft die maximale Mitgliederanzahl in deiner Gilde um 5. Dies gilt nur für deine derzeitige Gilde.
description.fi: Permanently increases the amount of members you can have in a guild by 5. Only works on the current guild you are in.
description.fil: Permanently increases the amount of members you can have in a guild by 5. Only works on the current guild you are in.
description.fr: Augmente le nombre maximal de membres dans votre guilde de 5 de manière permanente. Ne fonctionne que pour la guilde dans laquelle vous êtes.
description.id: Secara permanen meningkatkan jumlah anggota yang dapat Anda miliki dalam guild sebesar 5. Hanya berfungsi pada guild saat ini tempat Anda berada.
description.it: Permanently increases the amount of members you can have in a guild by 5. Only works on the current guild you are in.
description.jp: ギルドに所属できるメンバー数を永久的に5人増やします。現在所属しているギルドでのみ機能します。
description.kr: 길드에 가입할 수 있는 회원 수를 영구적으로 5명 늘립니다. 현재 소속된 길드에서만 적용됩니다.
description.nl: Permanently increases the amount of members you can have in a guild by 5. Only works on the current guild you are in.
description.pl: Permanently increases the amount of members you can have in a guild by 5. Only works on the current guild you are in.
description.ru: Permanently increases the amount of members you can have in a guild by 5. Only works on the current guild you are in.
description.sp: Aumenta permanentemente la cantidad de miembros que puede tener una Guild en 5. Solo funciona en la guild en el que estés.
description.sw: Permanently increases the amount of members you can have in a guild by 5. Only works on the current guild you are in.
description.th: เพิ่มจำนวนสมาชิกที่คุณสามารถมีได้ในกิลด์อย่างถาวร 5 ใช้ได้เฉพาะกับกิลด์ปัจจุบันที่คุณอยู่
description.tw: 永久增加5名公會成員，僅適用當前所在公會。
description.vi: Tăng vĩnh viễn số lượng thành viên bạn có thể có trong một bang hội lên 5. Chỉ hoạt động trên bang hội hiện tại mà bạn đang tham gia.
